attributes.action: Force tobacco companies to list the added chemical ingredients in their products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Something informative that smokers don't already know like that would do a far sight more than the thoughtless and provocative warnings currently forced on our tobacco products. I mean, why not just put fat naked people on fatty foods? (please don't take that seriously - no-one needs to see that and no-one needs to see a rotting lung or sperm on their smokes). The governments straight 'smoking kills' message has almost given tobacco companies license to put whatever damaging chemicals in cigarettes they choose to, as we all know, smoking already kills...
